Detector.Details: This detector finds Math.random calls before Math.sin calls It is a nonsensical detector.
It is a nonsensical detector to illustrate how to detect local variables and fields in method calls
This detector prints a control flow graph. It is a nonsensical detector.
This detector finds a cycle in a control flow graph It is a nonsensical detector.

BugPattern.LongDescription: Found Math.random call before Math.sin in {1}
